entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH IN EFFECT, Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers with a few thunderstorms beginning early this evening and ending late this evening. Clearing overnight. Risk of severe thunderstorms this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
